```{r, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  out.width = "100%",
  cache = TRUE
)
.cast_opts <- modifyList(
  asciicast::asciicast_knitr_options(),
  list(
    asciicast_theme = "github-light",
    asciicast_cols = 80,
    asciicast_omit_last_line = TRUE
  )
)
options(asciicast_knitr_svg = TRUE)
asciicast::init_knitr_engine(
  startup = quote({
    library(cli)
    options(cli.num_colors = cli::truecolor)
    set.seed(1) }),
  echo_input = FALSE,
  options = .cast_opts
)
```

# Built-in palettes

## `dichro`

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
cat(attr(cli::ansi_palettes, "info")$dichro)
```

```{asciicast}
#| dichro,
ansi_palette_show("dichro", colors = truecolor)
```

```{asciicast}
#| dichro-dark,
#| R.options = modifyList(.cast_opts, list(asciicast_theme = "solarized-dark"))
ansi_palette_show("dichro", colors = truecolor)
```
